name: Piss Off I'M Installing Software (early prototype)
name_original: Piss Off I'M Installing Software (early prototype)
description:
Fight off viruses as you try to install software onto your computer. Hackers become increasingly impatient and send more pervasive viruses as you continue to thwart their attempts to take over your PC. Don't let it crash.

Team:

Nelson Schneider

Daniel Douros

Taban Lewis

Robert Ontiveros
